description:
The WebSocketListener class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming WebSocket connection requests asynchronously. It is a lightweight listener that follows the official RFC 6455 WebSockets specification with an API very similar to the TcpListener class.

It supports secure connections and per message deflate compression.
